paste.body: 给博主回复请到：幾款著名的聊天軟件的安全性：Telegram,Signal,Discord,Roit.im,QQ,微信等，(ICQ,IRC以及Twister不談) 中国觉醒灵修神修宇宙能量场HolyINS Talk 中国觉醒灵修神修宇宙能量场HolyINS Talk讨论发表观点

import urlparse import urllib from collections import defaultdict # Magnet links to html # Written by innocentchild@zeroid.bit/innocentchild@cryptoid.bit/innocentchild@kaffie.bit # License: WTFPL def bytes_2_human_readable(number_of_bytes): if number_of_bytes < 0: raise ValueError("!!! number_of_bytes can't be smaller than 0 !!!") step_to_greater_unit = 1024. number_of_bytes = float(number_of_bytes) unit = 'bytes' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'KB' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'MB' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'GB' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'TB' precision = 1 number_of_bytes = round(number_of_bytes, precision) return str(number_of_bytes) + ' ' + unit file = open("complete_listing_part1_named.txt", 'r') data = defaultdict(str) for line in file: parsed = urlparse.urlparse(line) name = urllib.unquote(urlparse.parse_qs(parsed.query)['dn'][0]) size = bytes_2_human_readable(urlparse.parse_qs(parsed.query)['xl'][0]) data[name] = '' + name + '(' + size + ')' + '' keys = sorted(data, key=lambda s: s.lower()) newfile = open("listinghtml.txt", 'w') for key in keys: newfile.write(data[key]) newfile.close()

import urlparse import urllib from collections import defaultdict # Magnet links to html # Written by innocentchild@zeroid.bit/innocentchild@cryptoid.bit/innocentchild@kaffie.bit # License: WTFPL def bytes_2_human_readable(number_of_bytes): if number_of_bytes < 0: raise ValueError("!!! number_of_bytes can't be smaller than 0 !!!") step_to_greater_unit = 1024. number_of_bytes = float(number_of_bytes) unit = 'bytes' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'KB' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'MB' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'GB' if (number_of_bytes / step_to_greater_unit) >= 1: number_of_bytes /= step_to_greater_unit unit = 'TB' precision = 1 number_of_bytes = round(number_of_bytes, precision) return str(number_of_bytes) + ' ' + unit file = open("complete_listing_part1_named.txt", 'r') data = defaultdict(str) for line in file: parsed = urlparse.urlparse(line) name = urllib.unquote(urlparse.parse_qs(parsed.query)['dn'][0]) size = bytes_2_human_readable(urlparse.parse_qs(parsed.query)['xl'][0]) data[name] = '' + name + '(' + size + ')' + '' keys = sorted(data, key=lambda s: s.lower()) newfile = open("listinghtml.txt", 'w') for key in keys: newfile.write(data[key]) newfile.close()
